name: Infallible
description:
In the near future the AI known as 'INFALLIBLE' was created to solve the worlds problems. However years later it began attacking humanity. Since then the 'Agency' has formed from the remnants of humanity to destroy it, whatever the cost, including your life as one of their Agents.

Progress through 3 randomly generated floors with close range top-down gun combat, 4 unique bosses, 2 endings, with several lore pages to collect and uncover the truth alongside many challenging achievements.  

Each run of either Normal or Hard mode offers replayability with random Perks to choice from, found from exploring each floor, and defeating a challenging boss fight. Explore a variety of build options with different Perk combinations across 20+ Perks, alongside Active abilities which greatly enhance your strength.

Controls and game mechanics are explained in the Tutorial.

The free Demo offers the Tutorial, alongside the first floor of Normal. Whereas the full purchase offers the Tutorial, Normal and Hard, both with different endings. Hard includes an additional final boss and more. 

Will you need be made a martyr? Or a saviour?
